typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CommerceRootId as string,
		BillingGroupId as string,
		RatingAssetId as string,
		RatingMonth as string,
		RatingPeriodStartDate as string,
		RatingPeriodEndDate as string,
		PriceSheetId as string,
		PriceSheetVersion as string,
		EffectiveDate as string,
		Rnum as string,
		id as string,
		PartitionKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> gen2SourceSpnCred
gen2SourceSpnCred sink(input(
		CommerceRootId as string,
		BillingGroupId as string,
		RatingAssetId as string,
		RatingMonth as string,
		RatingPeriodStartDate as string,
		RatingPeriodEndDate as string,
		PriceSheetId as string,
		PriceSheetVersion as string,
		EffectiveDate as string,
		Rnum as string,
		id as string,
		PartitionKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> gen2SinkSpnCred
